nahumu:1:1: Iby’i Nineve1.Ibihanurirwa i Nineve. Igitabo cy’iyerekwa rya Nahumu Umwelekoshi.
nahumu:1:2: 2.Uwiteka ni Imana ifuha kandi irahōra, Uwiteka arahōra kandi agira uburakari bwinshi, Uwiteka ahōra ababisha be kandi abanzi be ababikira umujinya.
nahumu:1:3: 3.Uwiteka ntiyihutira kurakara, afite ububasha bwinshi kandi ntabwo yatsindishiriza utsinzwe n’urubanza. Inzira y’Uwiteka iba mu ishuheri no mu mugaru, kandi ibicu ni nk’umukungu utumurwa n’ibirenge bye.
nahumu:1:4: 4.Acyaha inyanja igakama agakamya n’imigezi yose, i Bashani n’i Karumeli hararabye, n’uburabyo bw’i Lebanoni burarabye.
nahumu:1:5: 5.Imisozi iratigitira imbere ye n’udusozi turayenga, kandi isi iterurirwa imbere ye, ni ukuri isi n’abayituyemo bose.
nahumu:1:6: 6.Ni nde wabasha guhagarara imbere y’umujinya we? Kandi ni nde wakwihanganira uburakari bwe bukaze? Umujinya we usutswe umeze nk’umuriro, kandi ibitare ni we ubimenagura.
nahumu:1:7: 7.Uwiteka ni mwiza, ni igihome ku munsi w’amakuba kandi azi abamwiringira.
nahumu:1:8: 8.I Nineve azahamarisha umwuzure w’amazi menshi, kandi abanzi be azabakurikirana no mu mwijima.
nahumu:1:9: 9.Icyo mugambirira ku Uwiteka ni iki? Azahatsembaho, ntabwo umubabaro uzahagaruka ubwa kabiri.
nahumu:1:10: 10.Kuko na bo bamera nk’amahwa asobekeranye cyangwa nk’abinamye mu nzoga zabo, bazatwikwa nk’ibikūri byumye.
nahumu:1:11: 11.Hariho uwasohotse muri wowe wagambiriye ibibi ku Uwiteka, akagira abandi inama yo gukora ibibi.
nahumu:1:12: 12.Uwiteka aravuga ati “Naho batunganirwa kandi ari benshi bazatsembwaho, kandi umwami wabo azaba avuyeho. Nubwo nakubabaje sinzongera kukubabaza ukundi.
nahumu:1:13: 13.Ndetse ubu ngiye kugucaho uburetwa bwe, nguceho n’ingoyi ikuboshye.”
nahumu:1:14: 14.Kandi Uwiteka yategetse ibyawe ngo nta mbuto zitirirwa izina ryawe zizongera kubaho, nzaca igishushanyo kibajwe n’igishushanyo kiyagijwe mbikure mu nzu y’ibigirwamana byawe, nzagucukurira imva yawe kuko uri umunyagisuzuguriro.
nahumu:2:1: 1.Dore mu mpinga z’imisozi amaguru y’uzanye inkuru nziza, akamamaza iby’amahoro! Yuda we, komeza ibirori byawe byera, higura imihigo yawe kuko umunyabibi atazongera kunyura iwawe, yatsembweho pe.
nahumu:2:2: Imana izatera abanzi b’Abisirayeli2.Uvunagura azamukiye imbere yawe, komera ku gihome, rinda inzira, kenyera ukomeze, iyongeremo imbaraga y’ubutwari.
nahumu:2:3: 3.Uwiteka agaruye icyubahiro cya Yakobo nk’icyubahiro cya Isirayeli, kuko abanyazi babasahuye bagakokora amashami y’inzabibu zabo.
nahumu:2:4: 4.Ingabo z’intwari ze bazirabye imituku, ingabo ze zishize ubwoba zambaye imihemba, ibyuma by’amagare ye y’intambara birarabagirana ku munsi wo kwitegura kwe, babangura amacumu biteye ubwoba.
nahumu:2:5: 5.Amagare y’intambara arahinda mu mayira, arihuta cyane anyuranamo mu nzira nyabagendwa. Uko asa ameze nk’imuri, arihuta nk’imirabyo.
nahumu:2:6: 6.Aribuka ibirangirire bye uko bagenda basitara, barihutira kujya ku nkike zaho kandi bakitegura kwirwanaho.
nahumu:2:7: 7.Imigomero y’imigezi iragomorowe, n’ingoro y’Umwami irariduka.
nahumu:2:8: 8.Huzabu yambitswe ubusa ajyanwa ari imbohe, abaja be baraganya nk’inuma ziguguza bikubita mu bituza.
nahumu:2:9: 9.Ariko i Nineve uhereye kera hari hameze nk’ikidendezi cy’amazi, ariko ubu barahunga. Barabahamagara bati “Nimuhagarare, nimuhagarare.” Ariko ntihagira n’umwe ukebuka.
nahumu:2:10: 10.Nimusahure ifeza, musahure n’izahabu, kuko ibibitswe n’ubwiza bw’ibintu byose by’igiciro cyinshi bidateze gushira.
nahumu:2:11: 11.Harimo ubusa, hose ni umusaka harasenywe. Umutima urihebye, amavi arakomangana, imibabaro yabaciye imigongo kandi mu maso habo hose harasuherewe.
nahumu:2:12: 12.Ubuvumo bw’intare buri hehe, n’aho imigunzu y’intare irīra, aho intare y’ingabo n’iy’ingore n’ibyana byazo byajandajandaga bitagira icyo byikanga?
nahumu:2:13: 13.Intare itanyagurira ibyana byayo ibibihagije, ikanigira ingore yayo, ikuzuza amasenga yayo ibyo yishe n’ubuvumo bwayo ibyo yasahuye.
nahumu:2:14: 14.Uwiteka Nyiringabo aravuga ngo “Dore ndakwibasiye kandi nzatwika amagare yawe y’intambara ahinduke umwotsi, n’imigunzu yawe y’intare izicishwa inkota. Nzakura iminyago yawe ku isi, kandi ijwi ry’intumwa zawe ntirizongera kumvikana ukundi.”
nahumu:3:1: Kurimburwa kw’i Nineve1.Umurwa uvusha amaraso uzabona ishyano! Wuzuwemo ibinyoma n’ubwambuzi, ntabwo basiba kunyaga.
nahumu:3:2: 2.Urusaku rw’ikiboko, urusaku rwo guhinda kw’inziga, imirindi y’amafarashi agenda aca isibo, ikiriri cy’amagare y’intambara asimbuka,
nahumu:3:3: 3.ugendera ku ifarashi akisuka mu rugamba, n’inkota irabya indimi, n’icumu rirabagirana, n’abishwe ishyano ryose, intumbi nyinshi zigerekeranye, n’abapfuye ntibabarika. Barasitara ku ntumbi zabo
nahumu:3:4: 4.ibyo byose byatewe n’ubusambanyi bukabije bwa maraya wakundwaga, umurozikazi w’umuhanga ugura amoko ubusambanyi bwe, akagurisha n’imiryango uburozi bwe.
nahumu:3:5: 5.Dore ndakwibasiye, ni ko Uwiteka Nyiringabo avuga, nzakubeyurira inkanda yawe mu maso hawe, kandi nzereka amoko ubwambure bwawe n’amahanga nyereke ibiteye isoni byawe.
nahumu:3:6: 6.Kandi nzakujugunyaho ibihumanya byangwa urunuka nkugayishe, kandi nzaguhindura igishungerwa.
nahumu:3:7: 7.Nuko abakureba bose bazaguhunga bavuge bati “I Nineve hararimbuwe. Ni nde uzaharirira?” Nzagushakira he abakumara umubabaro?
nahumu:3:8: 8.Mbese uruta i No Amoni hari hagati y’imigezi, hazengutswe n’amazi, igihome cyaho ari inyanja n’urusika ruhakingiye na rwo ari inyanja?
nahumu:3:9: 9.Etiyopiya na Egiputa hari amaboko yaho atagira ingano, Abaputi n’Abalubimu bari abafasha bawe.
nahumu:3:10: 10.Ariko abaho baragiye bajyanywe ari imbohe, n’abana babo bato babesagurije mu mahuriro y’amayira yose, n’abanyacyubahiro baho babakoreraho ubufindo burobanura, kandi abakomeye baho bose bababohesha iminyururu.
nahumu:3:11: 11.Nawe uzasinda, uzahishwa, uzishakira igihome ubitewe n’abanzi.
nahumu:3:12: 12.Ibihome byawe byose bizamera nk’imitini yeze imbuto z’imyimambere, iyo unyeganyejwe zihungukira mu kanwa k’umuryi.
nahumu:3:13: 13.Dore abantu bawe bagusigayeho ni abagore, amarembo y’igihugu cyawe yāguriwe abanzi bawe, umuriro wakongoye ibihindizo byawe.
nahumu:3:14: 14.Ivomere amazi azabe ahagije mu gihe cyo kugotwa, komeza ibihome byawe. Jya mu ibumba, ukate urwondo, ukomeze itanura ry’amatafari.
nahumu:3:15: 15.Ni ho umuriro uzagukongorera, uzicwa n’inkota ikumareho nk’uburima, wigwize nk’uburima, wigwize nk’inzige.
nahumu:3:16: 16.Wigwirizaga abacuruzi kuruta inyenyeri zo mu ijuru, uburima burarimbura bukīyamukira.
nahumu:3:17: 17.Ibikomangoma byawe bimeze nk’uburima, n’abagaba bawe nk’inzige ziguye ku nzitiro mu munsi w’ibitundwe maze izuba ryarasa zikaguruka, kandi aho ziba nta wuhazi.
nahumu:3:18: 18.Abungeri bawe barahunikira, mwami wa Ashuri we, abanyacyubahiro bawe bararuhutse, ubwoko bwawe bwatataniye mu misozi, kandi ntihaboneka uwo kubukoranya.
nahumu:3:19: 19.Nta muti wo komora uruguma rwawe, igisebe cyawe ni umufunzo. Abumvise inkuru zawe bose bakoma mu mashyi bakwishima hejuru, kandi abo utagiriraga nabi ni ba nde?
